summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 7th Avenue North from Highland Drive to Lee Street, and Comstock Street from 6th Avenue North to 7th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7842 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
